name: Victoria Stevenson
summary: Senior Interior Designer with extensive experience in high-end commercial and residential interiors, expertise in AutoCAD, Revit, and Adobe Creative Suite; active in green design (LEED AP) and NCIDQ certified; strong client relations and project management skills.
skills: Adobe Creative Suite (Acrobat Pro, Illustrator, InDesign, Photoshop)

experience.title: Lead Interior Designer
experience.description: Led interior design for a full-service architecture, interior design, and engineering firm; managed projects across commercial and residential sectors, including banks, luxury auto dealerships, universities, and municipal buildings; founding member of the Green Design Committee focusing on sustainable practices.

experience.title: Senior Interior Designer
experience.description: Delivered creative interior design services, collaborated with clients, contractors, and vendors; developed floor plans, budgets, schedules; presented concepts and managed project teams; selected finishes and furniture.

experience.title: Senior Interior Designer
experience.description: Boutique consultancy focusing on commercial and high-end interiors; led client and project management, codes, budgets, and schedules; delivered designs for global corporations.

experience.title: Interior Designer
experience.description: Additional experience in interior design projects.

experience.title: Retail Store Manager
experience.description: Managed retail operations and contributed to store design initiatives.

experience.title: CAD Draftsperson
experience.description: Drafting support for residential projects and technical documentation.

education.degree: Bachelor of Fine Arts, Interior Design
